title: 2 Bedroom Mother-In-Law Daylight Basement
posting_body: Cozy and brightly lit 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of downtown Duvall.
20 minute drive to Woodinville, 25 to Redmond, and only a 3 minute walk downhill to Main street shopping and restaurants.

Part of a beautifully maintained property with a lush garden and ample privacy, this ground level daylight basement was built in the 1990s as part of a major remodel to this charming and well-loved 1911 home.
The unit was further renovated and refreshed in 2016, and all appliances have been replaced since then (including the dishwasher, gas range, fridge, washer, dryer and water heater.
Detached garage and carport available for storage
Additional $250 fee for utilities (garbage collection, electricity, water, sewer, heat)
12 month lease term, month-to-month thereafter (or option to renew for another 12 months)
Pets ok on an individual basis
Tenant required to have tenant liability insurance
